thread.title: So many people are rooting for the Falcons after Donald Trump picked the Pats | For The Win
thread.title_full: So many people are rooting for the Falcons after Donald Trump picked the Pats | For The Win

author: Luke Kerr-Dineen
title: So many people are rooting for the Falcons after Donald Trump picked the Pats | For The Win
text:
So many people are rooting for the Falcons after Donald Trump picked the Pats So many people are rooting for the Falcons after Donald Trump picked the Pats By Luke Kerr-Dineen February 5, 2017 5:23 pm Follow @LukeKerrDineen 177 shares Follow @LukeKerrDineen 
President Donald Trump went on Fox News ahead of Super Bowl 51 to talk about all kinds of things that didn’t involve football, but ended making a Super Bowl 51 prediction anyway. 
It wasn’t really clear he knew much about the game — he never called the Atlanta Falcons by name and at one point referred to them as “the other team”— but saying he needed to stuck with his friends, he predicted the Pats would win by eight points. Trump predicts the Patriots will win the Super Bowl by 8 points. pic.twitter.com/SLgi1z7aOS 
— Washington Examiner (@dcexaminer) February 5, 2017 
Trump being the divisive figure that he is at the moment, that set off a bit of a reaction on Twitter, especially among his detractors. Many undecided neutrals before the game said they’d be pulling for the Falcons now that they know Trump is rooting for the Pats. Trump picked my patriots. He just jinxed my team #SuperBowlSunday 
— Riley Freeman (@RileyFreeman) February 5, 2017 me: i don't really care about the super bowl*donald trump picks patriots to win super bowl* 
— Dyce Hallas Broward (@RohnJossi) February 5, 2017 TRUMP PICKED THE PATRIOTS I THINK WE GOOD LOL 
— HIM THERE (@Sp n11) February 5, 2017 Everyone remember that Donald Trump is rooting for the Patriots. #SuperBowl 
— Cody Franklin (@CodyFoam) February 5, 2017 Trump: I'm rooting for the Patriots 
— Abdul Memon (@abdulamemon) February 5, 2017 #Falcons owner criticizes Trump on human rights #Patriots owner hopes his pal Trump will get ring back from Putin #GoAtlanta #RiseUp pic.twitter.com/t842y2w2LJ 
— Hunter Walk (@hunterwalk) February 5, 2017 Of course Trump picks the #Patriots Look at his haircut pic.twitter.com/y3GBA9XJRq
